name: Warbanners
description: Warbanners: the turn-based, tactical strategy game with role-playing elements that lets you manage a squad of mercenaries, and survive 42 campaign missions. Your goal? To earn a place among ancient legends!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: 2GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 Mb Storage: 250 MB available space
